For Web Searches for Aol, Google, Yahoo! 
infringing websites are as follows;

[private]	http://www.footprints-inthe-sand.com	
web currently locked by network server powweb.com

http://www.footprints-in-the-sand.com

Product ID ISBN 1882723120 Footprints in the Sand Life Story of Mary Stevenson published my copyrighted text in this book without my permission or payment

In books search results these books appear at Walmart, Powell Books, and Barnes & Nobles. Deseret Books has already complied to delete these books from sale. Also the publisher James Asay has been sent legal notice to comply.

As of November 11, 2004 [private] has agreed to comply, removal of this product of infringement has been guaranteed to be forfeited. [private] has mentioned he will notify these bookstores through the current distributors. Network letters are also appreciated to remind these companies to comply. Thank you.

Footprints in the Sand Life Story of Mary Stevenson Word Search ISBN 1882723120

<HR />

10/28/2004 13:39	XXXXXXXXXX	SOLAR WORLD	PAGE 01

<HR />
10/28/2004 13:39	XXXXXXXXXX	SOLAR WORLD	PAGE 02

Notice and Claim of Infringement

Date: September 23, 2004
To: Art.com, Scala Art, AllPosters, Cedco, Modem Art, Frontline Art, Barewalls,com/ &Affiliates Attention: Notification and Claim of Infringement

Dear Company and Affiliate Companies,

I, Carolyn Joyce Carty the undersigned state under penalty of perjury that I am the owner of intellectual property known as "Footprints" also known as "Footprints in the Sand" i.e.: One night a man had a dream version as described in the paragraph below;

One night I dreamed I was	 
walking along the beach with the  
Lord. Many scenes from my life	  
flashed across the sky.
In each scene I noticed footprints  
In the sand. Sometimes there were 
two sets of footprints, other times
there was one only. 
...
Mary Stevenson, 1936

One night I dreamed a dream.	    
I was walking along the beach	       
with my Lord. Across the dark sky   
flashed scenes from my life. For
each scene, I noticed two sets of
footprints in the sand, one
belonging to me and one to my
Lord.
...
Margaret Rollback Fowere,1969

One night a man had a dream. He
dreamed He was walking along
the beach with the LORD. Across
the sky flashed scenes from His 
life. For each scene He notice two
sets of footprints in the sand. One
belonging to Him and the other to 
the LORD.
...
Carolyn Joyce Carty, 1963



<HR />
10/28/2004 13:39	XXXXXXXXXX	SOLAR WORLD	PAGE 03

I am the copyright owner, of said property named herein of Footprint by Carolyn Joyce Carty 1963.

I have good faith belief that the items identified to product numbers as mentioned hereof are a complete violation of infringement by any other claimant, agent, representative or parties claiming said ownership of work identified in this statement. This Information is true and correct.

Product Identification Numbers for products produced by Companies or any other entity are in direct violation of Title 17 US.Copyright Law provided by the United States of America library of Congress Copyright Office.

Infringed Parties Names are clarified on this document, this 22nd day of September 2004.

[private] also known as [private] deceased or any other named or unnamed heir thereof i.e.; also known beneficiary named [private] son of [private] or any other transferee, assigner or assignee named [private], [private], and [private], including publishers and or clearinghouses of any products promoted by this name, including the rights of all such material for profit and nonprofit use.

<HR />
	XXXXXXXXXX	SOLAR WORLD	PAGE 04

As mentioned to Companies & Affiliates on several occasions in the year 2003, 2004 that those materials supplied to the public for sale and profit were not negotiated or contracted for use or permission of use of my copyrights. Furthermore Companies & Affiliates also notified of this first hand when found advertising products for [private] in the year 2003, 2004 to cease and desist said use.

In following up last years business with Company & Affiliates they then proceeded to sell the very same products now under [private] name. This leads me to believe that the course of action taken by companies were for mere profit. Companies & Affiliates are advised and aware of the various text created by the various authors.

No other authors work can support or substantiate the text used by any company and the infringement named in this document pursuant to filing a lawsuit of this infringement.

Products made for profit in cases of infringement constitute a willful act to commit fraud in which such acts may be investigated and prosecuted by the US Atoorney, Department of justice , in the matter of this case the Attorney General's Office has received numerous complaints to investigate these counterfeit products.

Mediation has been an option offered by me while dealing with the pursuit of this claim, compnaies & affiliates have failed to negotiate any suitable settlement.

Infringement fines can be determined to a maximum benefit of $250,000,00 dollars for each item infringed upon, each specific product and variation of any given product. So far Companies &Affiliates Product infringement has produced 2--50 such items of infringement.

This infringement also hinders the accurate historical account to the public of it's original creation which has caused personal harm and damages including credibility issues.... [ unreadable ]

I propose that these conflicts be resolved amicably.

You are hereby notified of my legal and lawful complaint regarding these issues of infringement. I do hope you choose to resolve these matters lawfully.

Respectfully,
Carolyn Joyce Carty
Copyright Owner/ author
